#summary The sequence of past and future releases

This page contains the release plan and history of past releases for the project.

= Release 0.1 =
*status* : currently deployed at http://kate.homeunix.net/bayesfor/

*associated issues* : [http://code.google.com/p/bayes-swarm/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.1 issue list]

This is the first prototype of the project. See PrototypeOne for further info

= Release 0.1.1 =
*status* : work in progress

*associated issues* : [http://code.google.com/p/bayes-swarm/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.1.1 issue list]

Main features :
  * multi-language support

= Release 0.2 =
*status* : work in progress

*associated issues* : [http://code.google.com/p/bayes-swarm/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.2 issue list]

Main features :
  * support for RSS feeds
  * article storage

= Release 0.3 =
*status* : planned

*associated issues* : [http://code.google.com/p/bayes-swarm/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3ARelease-0.3 issue list]

Main features :
